self_predictions.prediction_summary: Zoloev feels optimistic about the fight with John Brzenk, believing he has improved his top roll and side pressure since their last match. He plans to attack John's wrist and finish the fight with his side pressure.

John Brzenk.strength: Respected legend, but Zoloev believes his wrist is vulnerable now.
John Brzenk.health: John is older and has injuries, but still formidable.
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Last match was in A1 Russia, where Zoloev's inside move was more effective than his outside move.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Zoloev roots for Genadi but acknowledges Michael Todd's unique technique and unpredictability. He notes Genadi was not at his best in his last fight.

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Technically good, can fight in every position.
Genadi Kvikvinia.health: Returning from a long break, not at his best in last fight.
Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Did not perform well in his last fight.

Michael Todd.strength: Unique technique, can surprise in the hook.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Zoloev considers Gasparini the favorite but notes he has made mistakes in past fights. He respects Arif Ertem but doesn't know much about him.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Has won and lost in past fights.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Zoloev notes Oniani is in good shape and ready to fight, but Oleg Zhokh is recovering from an accident and may not be at his previous level.

Betkili Oniani.strength: In good shape, ready to fight.
Betkili Oniani.previous_match_summary: Offered to fight anyone under 100 kg in left arm.

Oleg Zhokh.strength: Recovering, not at previous level yet.
Oleg Zhokh.previous_match_summary: Not as strong as before his accident.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Zoloev believes Tsonev has a good chance against Hutchings if he avoids Hutchings' strong position in the hook. He praises Tsonev's patience and technique.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Winning streak, but Zoloev sees vulnerabilities.

Yordan Tsonev.previous_match_summary: Beat Bogoslov in a surprising match.
